goals.complete: Fastulf Jotharsson, the Speaker of Wolf, told me about a powerful wolf that has been corrupted by the Sons of Svanir. Called Ormi, he's running wild and posing a danger to the entire region. Together, Eir and I will find this wounded wolf and release his spirit.

goals.active: Release the corrupted wolf Ormi from his suffering.
goals.complete: With Eir's help, I put the corrupted wolf Ormi out of his misery and released his troubled spirit. The Sons of Svanir will pay for corrupting one of Wolf's favorites.
Fastulf Jotharsson thanked us for releasing Ormi's spirit and punishing the Sons of Svanir who corrupted him. He also promised us a blessing from Wolf when we face Korag.
